meanings.sent1: The new smartphone is the techiest device on the market.
meanings.sent2: She always buys the techiest gadgets as soon as they are released.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to fix the computer ended up making it even techier!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like the techiest computer, processing information at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The techiest features of the car made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or involving advanced technology
meanings.sent1: The robot's design was the techiest one we had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in the techiest equipment to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The techiest invention of the year was a self-driving suitcase!
meanings.sent4: Her room looked like the techiest space station with all the gadgets around.
meanings.sent5: The techiest solutions were needed to tackle the complex problem.

meanings.definition: Showing a high level of technical skill or knowledge
meanings.sent1: He proved to be the techiest programmer in the team.
meanings.sent2: The techiest engineers were assigned to work on the top-secret project.
meanings.sent3: The techiest chef in town created a dish that amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to fix any device made her the techiest person in the family.
meanings.sent5: The techiest minds in the industry gathered to discuss the latest trends.
